inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status (ASA PS) 1-2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients scheduled for elective colonoscopy under Monitored Anesthesia Care in a University Hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who signed on written informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous history of large bowel surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: an addictions to opiates or sedatives
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: a previous history of adverse events to any drug used in the present study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: performance of any additional diagnostic procedure after completion of colonoscopy.
exclusion.label: not_met
